title: ISO-27017 | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This topic describes how Snowflake supports customers with ISO-27017 compliance requirements.

The International Organization for Standardization provides requirements for establishing, implementing, maintaining, and continually
improving an information security management system. Snowflake’s ISO Certificate is available for download by
clicking here.
The statement of applicability also includes control objectives from the ISO 27017:2015 & ISO 27018:2019 framework.
ISO 27017:2015 provides guidance for information security controls applicable specifically to cloud service provisioning and usage.
